General.Name: Hawesko Holding AG
General.Description: Hawesko Holding SE, together with its subsidiaries, trades in and sells wines, champagnes, and spirits in Germany and the rest of Europe. The company operates through three segments: Retail, B2B, and E-commerce. It operates retail outlets through independent agency partners; sells products through an in-house sales force and trade representatives, as well as engages in gifts business for corporate and private customers based on a special catalogue. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Hamburg, Germany. Hawesko Holding SE operates as a subsidiary of Tocos Beteiligung GmbH.
